title.rendered: Best Affordable Camera Phones for Bloggers 2018

content.rendered:
An image tells a thousand words and today’s bloggers need the best camera phone to capture their images.

There are now even awards for the best blog and Instagram photos. Below show the top affordable camera phones that bloggers can use.

Samsung Galaxy S7

The S7 has now dropped in price due to its age, this means contract deals on the S7 are now very affordable.
The S7 boasts several good features.

  • 12 MP (mega pixels)
  • 4K video recording
  • Optical image stabilisation
  • 26mm Equivalent

As an affordable smart phone this would suit a new blogger that needs to start on a budget. Check out the latest deals here.

Apple iPhone 7

Another older smart phone that was released on September 16th, 2016. The iPhone 7 boasts sleek design but is smaller than the latest iPhones (not always a bad thing).

The iPhone 7 has a very similar camera to the S7 above.

  • 12 MP
  • f/1.8 lense
  • 28mm Equivalent
  • Optical image stabilisation
  • 4K video recording

As he phone is now two years old you can pick up a cheap iPhone 7 contract at a very reasonable price. Check out the iPhone 7 deals here.

LG G6

The LG G6 is LG’s leading smart phone in terms of design. It has a sleek yet robust casing and boasts a water proof feature for the clumsy blogger.

Many tech review sites compare the LG G6 to the Samsung Galaxy 8 in terms of camera quality.

  • Two rear cameras, one with wide angle
  • 13 MP
  • Optical image stabilisation
  • F/1.7 lense

The LG G6 is a very affordable phone with no front up free costs and pricing starting from £28 per month. Check out the LG G6 deals here.
